basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ [Alcide kAudit](https://awesomeopensource.com/project/alcideio/kaudit) Solution for Microsoft Sentinel allows you to automatically export your Kubernetes cluster audit logs into Microsoft Sentinel in real-time. This enables enhanced visibility and observability into your Kubernetes audit logs, providing robust security and monitoring capabilities for forensics purposes. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Azure Monitor HTTP Data Collector API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-collector-api) **Data Connectors:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Alcide kAudit. You can get Alcide kAudit custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery after this Solution deploys. This data connector creates custom log table(s) alcide_kaudit_activity_1_CL alcide_kaudit_detections_1_CL alcide_kaudit_selections_count_1_CL alcide_kaudit_selections_details_1_CL in your Microsoft Sentinel / Azure Log Analytics workspace.
